com.communote.common.util

Class ColorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.common.util.ColorUtils

  • public class ColorUtils
extends Object
    Utility for converting color strings to Color objects.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Color decodeRGB(String colorString)
      Decode a string with an RGB color into a Color object.
      static Color decodeRGBSilently(String colorString)
      Like decodeRGB(String) but does not throw an exception if the color cannot be parsed.
      static String encodeRGBHexString(Color color, boolean withAlpha)
      Create a string representation of the color in the format #RRGGBB or #RRGGBBAA if withAlpha is true.
      static String encodeRGBIntString(Color color, boolean withAlpha)
      Create a string of the integer values of the RGB components of the color.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • decodeRGB

        public static Color decodeRGB(String colorString)
        Decode a string with an RGB color into a Color object. If the color cannot be decoded an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        colorString - the string to decode. Supported formats are hex and integer notations. The hex notation has to have the format #RRGGBB or #RRGGBBAA with an alpha channel. The integer notation has to have the format R,G,B or R,G,B,A with an alpha channel and values of the components have to be in the range 0-255.
        Returns:
        the color

      • decodeRGBSilently

        public static Color decodeRGBSilently(String colorString)
        Like decodeRGB(String) but does not throw an exception if the color cannot be parsed.
        Parameters:
        colorString - the string to decode
        Returns:
        the color or null if the color cannot be parsed

      • encodeRGBHexString

        public static String encodeRGBHexString(Color color,
                                        boolean withAlpha)
        Create a string representation of the color in the format #RRGGBB or #RRGGBBAA if withAlpha is true. The RR is the 2 byte hex value of the red component of the color.
        Parameters:
        color - the color to encode
        withAlpha - whether to include the alpha value in the result
        Returns:
        the string or null if color was null

      • encodeRGBIntString

        public static String encodeRGBIntString(Color color,
                                        boolean withAlpha)
        Create a string of the integer values of the RGB components of the color. The components are separated by comma.
        Parameters:
        color - the color to encode
        withAlpha - whether the alpha value should be appended
        Returns:
        the string or null if color was null
